Keywords: Avengers , Monster , Scientist , Warp World
Real Name: Scott Banner
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Blocking, Characters
THE MADDER I GET, THE SMALLER I GET: When Little Monster hits or is hit, give him a Jade Germ token. // Little Monster can use the following effects based on the number of his Jade Germ tokens:
*1+: Tiny damage symbol
*2+: Super Senses
*3+: Close Combat Expert
*4+: When Little Monster rolls for Super Senses, after rolling you may remove any number of Jade Germ tokens to increase the result of the roll by that amount and after resolutions, you may heal him equal to the number of Jade Germs removed.
GAMMA GRENADE: Charge, Flurry. // When an adjacent friendly character makes a range attack, after resolutions you may place Little Monster adjacent to a hit target.
SMASH PUNY ATOMS!: CLOSE: Destroy all blocking terrain within 3 squares and make a close attack targeting all opposing characters within 3 squares. Each hit character is dealt 3 damage instead of normal damage.
